name: Zombielicious (BETA)
description:
Steve woke up in a different place...a forest maybe?

"Where am I? Doesn't matter, I just know that I can not be devoured by these hideous creatures! "

Help Steve to survive as long as possible against hordes of zombies. What maximum wave did you survive? Write in the comments!

Oh yes, it's still in beta version and I know it, but did you like the game? Show that you want this game to continue to be developed. Imagine, new weapons? maps monsters multiplatforms Aliens?

If you want to, you can follow me on:

  • Twitch.TV
  • Instagram
  • Artstation Profile

Thank you so much for playing. I hope you enjoy it.
